content: Rice blast disease appears as diamond-shaped lesions on leaves with gray centers and brown margins. Apply Tricyclazole 75% WP @ 0.6g/liter or Carbendazim 50% WP @ 1g/liter for control.
Tomato early blight shows brown spots with concentric rings on older leaves. Remove affected leaves and spray Mancozeb 75% WP @ 2.5g/liter every 10-15 days.
Wheat rust appears as orange-brown pustules on leaves and stems. Use resistant varieties and apply Propiconazole 25% EC @ 1ml/liter if infection is severe.
